languages.text: "И Нихель". {n}Медная маска с шипением начинает размыкаться. Аугменты отгибаются в стороны, открывая изуродованное ожогами лицо. Женское лицо, на котором горит пара черных, живых глаз.{/n} "Скепсис. Та, кто подвергает сомнению".

"And Nihel." {n}The brass mask starts to unlock with a hissing sound. The augmetics bend back, revealing a face disfigured by burns. A woman's face with a pair of darkly radiant, vibrant eyes.{/n} "Scepticism. The one who doubts."
languages.original_text: "И Нихель". {n}Медная маска с шипением начинает размыкаться. Аугменты отгибаются в стороны, открывая изуродованное ожогами лицо. Женское лицо, на котором горит пара черных, живых глаз.{/n} "Скепсис. Та, кто подвергает сомнению".

traits.locale_text: "And Nihel." {n}The brass mask starts to unlock with a hissing sound. The augmetics bend back, revealing a face disfigured by burns. A woman's face with a pair of darkly radiant, very alive eyes.{/n} "Scepticism. The one who doubts."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

traits.locale_text: "And Nihel." {n}The brass mask starts to unlock with a hissing sound. The augmetics bend back, revealing a face disfigured by burns. A woman's face with a pair of darkly radiant, very alive eyes.{/n} "Scepticism. The one who doubts."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

traits.locale_text: "And Nihel." {n}The brass mask starts to unlock with a hissing sound. The augmetics bend back, revealing a face disfigured by burns. A woman's face with a pair of darkly radiant, vibrant eyes.{/n} "Scepticism. The one who doubts."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

traits.locale_text: "And Nihel." {n}The brass mask starts to unlock with a hissing sound. The augmetics bend back, revealing a face disfigured by burns. A woman's face with a pair of darkly radiant, vibrant eyes.{/n} "Scepticism. The one who doubts."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

traits.locale_text: "And Nihel." {n}The brass mask starts to unlock with a hissing sound. The augmetics bend back, revealing a face disfigured by burns. A woman's face with a pair of darkly radiant, vibrant eyes.{/n} "Scepticism. The one who doubts."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

traits.locale_text: "And Nihel." {n}The brass mask starts to unlock with a hissing sound. The augmetics bend back, revealing a face disfigured by burns. A woman's face with a pair of darkly radiant, vibrant eyes.{/n} "Scepticism. The one who doubts."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: 「そしてニヘル」{n}真ちゅう製のマスクがシューッという音とともに外れる。オーグメティックが後方に曲がると、火傷痕だらけの醜い顔が現れる。女性の顔と共に暗い光を放つ、力強い瞳があらわになった。{/n}「懐疑。疑う者」
languages.original_text: "And Nihel." {n}The brass mask starts to unlock with a hissing sound. The augmetics bend back, revealing a face disfigured by burns. A woman's face with a pair of darkly radiant, vibrant eyes.{/n} "Scepticism. The one who doubts."

traits.locale_text: 「そしてニヘル」{n}真ちゅう製のマスクがシューッという音とともに外れる。オーグメティックが後方に曲がると、火傷痕だらけの醜い顔が現れる。女性の顔と共に暗い光を放つ、力強い瞳があらわになった。{/n}「懐疑。疑う者」
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: “还有妮赫尔。”{n}铜面具发出了嘶嘶声，逐渐打开。植入物移至后方，露出一张被烧伤毁容的脸。那是一张女性的脸，她乌黑发亮的双眼炯炯有神。{/n}“她代表‘怀疑’，是发出疑问之人。”
languages.original_text: "And Nihel." {n}The brass mask starts to unlock with a hissing sound. The augmetics bend back, revealing a face disfigured by burns. A woman's face with a pair of darkly radiant, vibrant eyes.{/n} "Scepticism. The one who doubts."

traits.locale_text: “还有雅珀。”{n}铜面具发出了嘶嘶声，逐渐打开。植入物移至后方，露出一张被烧伤毁容的脸。那是一张女性的脸，她乌黑发亮的双眼炯炯有神。{/n}“她代表‘怀疑’，是发出疑问之人。”
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: « Et Nihel. » {n}Avec un sifflement, le masque en cuivre commence à se déverrouiller et les augmétiques se retirent, révélant le visage défiguré d'une femme aux yeux sombres, mais débordants de vie.{/n} « Le scepticisme. Celle qui doute de tout. »
languages.original_text: "And Nihel." {n}The brass mask starts to unlock with a hissing sound. The augmetics bend back, revealing a face disfigured by burns. A woman's face with a pair of darkly radiant, vibrant eyes.{/n} "Scepticism. The one who doubts."

traits.locale_text: « Et Nihel. » {n}Avec un sifflement, le masque en cuivre commence à se déverrouiller et les augmétiques se retirent, révélant le visage défiguré d'une femme aux yeux sombres, mais débordants de vie.{/n} « Le scepticisme. Celle qui doute de tout. »
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: «Y Nihel». {n} La máscara de latón comienza a desbloquearse con un sonido sibilante. Los auméticos ceden, revelando un rostro desfigurado por quemaduras. Un rostro de mujer con un par de ojos oscuros radiantes y vibrantes.{/n} «El Escepticismo. La que duda».
languages.original_text: "And Nihel." {n}The brass mask starts to unlock with a hissing sound. The augmetics bend back, revealing a face disfigured by burns. A woman's face with a pair of darkly radiant, vibrant eyes.{/n} "Scepticism. The one who doubts."

traits.locale_text: «Y Nihel». {n} La máscara de latón comienza a desbloquearse con un sonido sibilante. Los auméticos ceden, revelando un rostro desfigurado por quemaduras. Un rostro de mujer con un par de ojos oscuros radiantes y vibrantes.{/n} «El Escepticismo. La que duda».
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Und Nihel." {n}Die Messingmaske beginnt sich mit einem Zischen zu öffnen. Die Augmentationen klappen nach hinten und geben ein von Verbrennungen entstelltes Gesicht preis. Das Gesicht einer Frau mit zwei dunkel strahlenden, lebendigen Augen.{/n} "Skepsis. Zweifel."
languages.original_text: "And Nihel." {n}The brass mask starts to unlock with a hissing sound. The augmetics bend back, revealing a face disfigured by burns. A woman's face with a pair of darkly radiant, vibrant eyes.{/n} "Scepticism. The one who doubts."

traits.locale_text: "Und Nihiel." {n}Die Messingmaske beginnt sich mit einem Zischen zu öffnen. Die Augmentationen klappen nach hinten und geben ein von Verbrennungen entstelltes Gesicht preis. Das Gesicht einer Frau mit zwei dunkel strahlenden, lebendigen Augen.{/n} "Skepsis. Zweifel."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Son olarak Nihel." {n}Pirinç maske, bir tıslama sesiyle açılmaya başlıyor. Ogmetikler geriye doğru kıvrılıp yanıklarla biçimi bozulmuş bir yüzü ortaya çıkarıyor. Esrarengiz bir ışıltı yayan bir çift göze sahip bir kadın yüzü.{/n} "Kuşkuculuk. Her şeyden şüphelenen."
languages.original_text: "And Nihel." {n}The brass mask starts to unlock with a hissing sound. The augmetics bend back, revealing a face disfigured by burns. A woman's face with a pair of darkly radiant, vibrant eyes.{/n} "Scepticism. The one who doubts."

traits.locale_text: "Ve Nihel." {n}Pirinç maske bir tıslama sesiyle açılmaya başlıyor. Ogmetikler geriye doğru kıvrılıyor ve yanıklarla biçimi bozulmuş bir yüzü ortaya çıkarıyor. Esrarengiz bir ışıltı yayan bir çift göze sahip bir kadın yüzü.{/n} "Kuşkuculuk. Şüphe eden kişi."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper
